job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-24T15:36:21.000Z", "description": "

Responsibilities

  • Implementation of AI and ML applications in company with the Deutsche Bank IPB Business Organisation.
  • Understanding and translating business requirements into technical concepts as preparation for AI application development.
  • Designing machine learning systems and self-running artificial intelligence (AI) software to automate predictive models.
  • Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools.
  • Turning unstructured data into useful information by e.g. applying NLP.
  • Advanced analytics of business data using modern statistical approaches and analytical systems.
  • Execute data science experiments to gain new insights into the available data, which allows generating new business opportunities.
  • Visualisation of data using common BI tools.
  • Advanced pre-processing of data as required by the respective AI application.
  • Delivery of AI and ML application on modern infrastructure in an international business context.
  • Train and retrain systems when necessary.
  • Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks if necessary.
  • Rollout and document changes and applications according to requlatory requirements.
  • Maintain and deliver Bugfixes for existing AI and ML applications.

Profile Requirements

  • BSc in Computer Science or similar field; Master\u2019s degree is a plus.
  • Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role.
  • Extensive knowledge of ML frameworks, libraries, data structures, data modelling, and software architecture.
  • In-depth knowledge of mathematics, statistics, and algorithms.
  • Ability to write robust code in Python and if necessary R.
  • Knowledge of common Python frameworks in the area of data processing, data science and machine learning e.g. Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Numpy, Tensorflow and others.
  • Experience with visualizing data in e.g. Tableau or Qlik Sense.
  • Excellent communication skills.
  • Ability to work in a team.
  • Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Structured and intrinsically motivated way of working.
  • Capability to work in a fast paced and changing environment.

Optional

  • Experience in the area of cloud computing ideally GCP or similar.
  • First experience with low code Data Science tools e.g. Kubeflow.
  • Experience with specific NLP frameworks e.g. NLTK, Spacy.
  • Experience with implementing ML applications in a Hadoop environment.
